author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: You should add a `[compat]` section to your `Project.toml`, especially since the `isnothing` function makes this package only compatible with Julia >= 1.1.
Package has been updated and new package request is at #737 to replace this one.
Please retrigger for 0.1.0 instead of opening a new registration request skipping a version.

I've created release `v0.1.0`, [here](https://github.com/analytech-solutions/Todo.jl/releases/tag/v0.1.0) it is.
<!-- c8a2f0b0-7871-11e9-9ef9-235df6810ac1 -->
